Uses of Package
com.dhemery.polling

Packages that use com.dhemery.polling
com.dhemery.expressing Composable methods to evaluate boolean expressions, make assertions, wait for conditions, and take action when preconditions are met. 
com.dhemery.polling Evaluate conditions repeatedly. 
 

Classes in com.dhemery.polling used by com.dhemery.expressing
Ticker
          Marks time in fixed-size intervals called "ticks" and expires at some instant after starting.
 

Classes in com.dhemery.polling used by com.dhemery.polling
ComposedPoller
          A poller composed of objects that perform the specified actions before polling, between polls, on poll failure, and to determine whether to continue polling when the condition is not satisfied.
Poller
          Repeatedly evaluate a condition until the condition is satisfied.
Ticker
          Marks time in fixed-size intervals called "ticks" and expires at some instant after starting.
